definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Several hydrolases to chitosan and methods were described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 就酶法制備低分子量殼聚糖的方法進行了綜述性報道。

sentences.english: The material has quite high molecular weight and is in a non-flat type spatial structure.
sentences.chinese: 這類材料的分子量較大，並具有非平板型空間結構。

sentences.english: And I thought molecular weight sounded much less nerdy than molar mass.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲分子量聽起來不像莫耳質量那麼乏味。

sentences.english: Salt, besides being of a lower molecular weight, also dissociates in two ions.
sentences.chinese: 鹽不但分子量低，而且其溶於水中可形成兩個離子。

sentences.english: Burley found labeled glucose and fructose in equimolar amounts.
sentences.chinese: 波里發現等克分子量的示蹤葡萄糖和果糖。

sentences.english: Viroid is small and exists less in host, which is difficult to purify.
sentences.chinese: 類病毒分子量小，在寄主體內含量低，不易提純。

sentences.english: Different molecular masses of LS have different influences on the suspension fluidity.
sentences.chinese: 不同分子量的木鈉對煤漿的流動性會有不同的影響。

sentences.english: The product was used to do the melt spun test directly and the fiber of the HMWPPS was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 產品直接作抽絲試驗，得到高分子量聚苯硫醚纖維。

sentences.english: The low-molecular-weight homolog III shows no difference in catalytic activity toward the two cycloalkenes.
sentences.chinese: 同源低分子量顯示使用的環烯烴無催化活性差異。

sentences.english: The freezing point has been determined out 478.
sentences.chinese: 用凝固點下降法測定了產品的分子量爲478。

sentences.english: Fibronectin (FN) is a high molecular weight glycoprotein.
sentences.chinese: 纖連蛋白是一種高分子量的糖蛋白。

sentences.english: The relative molecular weight distribution and the concentration of organic matters had significant effect on coagulation removal of iron.
sentences.chinese: 有機物的分子量分佈和濃度對混凝除鐵有很大影響。

sentences.english: And a high molecular weight poly(arylene ether nitrile sulfone) has obtained.
sentences.chinese: 獲得了高分子量的聚芳醚腈碸。

sentences.english: Extra high-Molecular cationic, anionic, non-ionic Flocculation agent.
sentences.chinese: 超高分子量陰，陽，非離子絮凝劑。

sentences.english: UHMWPE Sheet is resistant to many dilute acids, solvents and cleaning agents.
sentences.chinese: 超高分子量聚乙烯板，耐許多稀酸，溶劑和清潔劑。

sentences.english: Similar to other low-molecular-weight amines, it has a fishy odor.
sentences.chinese: 與其他低分子量的胺類相似，它聞起來有魚腥味。

definition: components/individual parts making up a compound
